TUTORIAL.NODE: Press SPACE or CLICK whist hanging on a wall to wall jump.
Gravity Elevators pull you upwards as long as you are hanging on to them.
Press SPACE or CLICK right after landing to execute a Power Jump to ascend faster.
Pick up beakers to increase your score.
Hitting SLIME and other hazards will stun you. Mash the SPACE or CLICK key to recover.
You can not grip surfaces made from ICE. You will slide freely up and down them.
Pressing SPACE or CLICK mid jump will execute a double jump. Use it to dodge hazards.
Pressing SPACE or CLICK mid jump will execute a double jump. Use it to dodge hazards.
Press SPACE or CLICK when over a BOOST PAD to boost upwards extra fast.
Press SPACE or CLICK when over a SWITCH PAD to change direction.
Time your jumps to avoid the Drone attacks as you climb.
When stunned hit the SPACE or CLICK button repeatedly to recover. In recovery hit SPACE or CLICK to boost towards the wall.
Complete MISSIONS to gain ranks. Each rank you gain awards you a RETRY you can use.
Press SPACE or CLICK to jump along the floor.
TUTORIAL TEXT CAN HAVE AS MANY AS THIS NUMBER OF CHARACTERS BEFORE IT RUNS OUT OF SPACE. OTHERWISE THE TUTORIAL SCREEN WILL NEED REDESIGN. DUNCAN
